snippet: Aides to Commissioner Raymond W. Kelly deliver to him a vast report brimming with statistics and highlighting his preference for having facts at his fingertips.
abstract: Aides to New York City Police Commissioner Raymond W Kelly deliver to him a vast weekly report brimming with statistics and highlighting his preference for having facts at his fingertips; briefing offers snapshot of sprawling department, as well as the man who runs it.
lead_paragraph: Aides to Commissioner Raymond W. Kelly deliver to him a vast report brimming with statistics and highlighting his preference for having facts at his fingertips.

headline.seo: Weekly Briefing Provides Lengthy Snapshot of Kelly and N.Y.P.D.
headline.main: Weekly Police Briefing Offers Snapshot of Department and Its Leader
headline.print_headline: Weekly Police Briefing Offers Snapshot of Department and Its Leader
